sources.title: THE ANNA AKHMATOVA FILE 1989
sources.description: Title: The Anna Achmatova File - Lichnoe delo Anny Akhmatovoy (1990) Directed by: Semyon Aranovich Date of birth: 23 July 1934, Derazhnya, Khmelnytskyy province, Soviet Union Date of death: 1995 (age 60) Writing credits: Semyon Aranovich, Yelena Ignatova Music: Sofiya Gubajdulina, Aleksandr Knaifel Year: 1990 Country: Soviet Union Language: Russian Color: Color | Black and White Runtime: 65 min. Synopsis An impressionistic look at the life of Russian poet, Anna Akhmatova, 1889-1966. It begins and ends with footage from her funeral, and includes readings from her diaries and of her poems. Also included are passages of official Soviet criticism.
